trans-unit.source: Represents image data returned by a decoder and accepted by encoders.
trans-unit.target: 表示解碼器所傳回和編碼器所接受的影像資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> provides additional functionality not defined by <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> by providing access to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Thumbnail%2A> associated with a particular frame of an image.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> 提供未定義的其他功能<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>藉由提供存取<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Thumbnail%2A>特定畫面格的映像相關聯。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> also supports the writing of metadata information by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> 也支援使用的中繼資料資訊寫入<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A>屬性或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> returned from a decoder is always frozen.
trans-unit.target: 任何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>從傳回始終凍結的解碼器。

trans-unit.source: If you require a modifiable copy, you must first create a copy of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Clone%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要的可修改複本，您必須先建立一份<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Clone%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Only [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] format images support multiple frames.
trans-unit.target: 只有[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)]格式映像支援多個框架。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立新<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> object to open a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] graphic and write metadata by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>物件開啟[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)]圖形和寫入的中繼資料，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that represents the base <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> of the current context.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中進行覆寫時，會取得或設定值，這個值表示目前內容的基底 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> of the current context.
trans-unit.target: 目前內容的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> objects that are associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中進行覆寫時，會取得與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> objects that are associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 物件的唯讀集合。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> based on the supplied arguments.
trans-unit.target: 根據提供的引數建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that is used to construct the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 用來建構 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 建立新的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: The `bitmapStream` can be closed after the frame is created only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad> cache option is used.
trans-unit.target: `bitmapStream`後建立框架時，才可以將它關閉<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad>使用快取選項。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand> cache option retains the stream until the frame is needed.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand>快取選項會保留在資料流，直到需要為止框架。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption%29> method to specify create and cache options.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption%29>方法，以指定建立並快取選項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that identifies the source of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" />，識別 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 的來源。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to construct a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> from a given <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>從給定<xref:System.Uri>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> that is used to construct this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 用來建構這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />。

trans-unit.source: The location of the bitmap from which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> is created.
trans-unit.target: 點陣圖的位置，其中會建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />。

trans-unit.source: The caching requirements for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 的快取需求。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />，從指定的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 建立 <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />，從指定的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 建立的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy%29> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy%29> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The source from which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> is constructed.
trans-unit.target: 用於建構 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 的來源。

trans-unit.source: A thumbnail image of the resulting <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 產生之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 的縮圖影像。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> with the specified thumbnail.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的縮圖，從指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> with the specified thumbnail.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的縮圖，從指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 建立的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />。

trans-unit.source: The stream from which this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> is constructed.
trans-unit.target: 在其中建構這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 的資料流。

trans-unit.source: The options that are used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 的選項。

trans-unit.source: The cache option that is used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 的快取選項。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />，從指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> 建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />，從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> 建立的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad> cache option if you wish to close the `bitmapStream` after the bitmap is created.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad>快取選項，如果您想要關閉`bitmapStream`點陣圖建立之後。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand> cache option retains access to the stream until the bitmap is needed and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand>快取選項會保留存取的資料流，直到需要點陣圖並清理工作由記憶體回收行程。

trans-unit.source: The location of the bitmap from which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> is created.
trans-unit.target: 點陣圖的位置，其中會建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />。

trans-unit.source: The options that are used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 的選項。

trans-unit.source: The cache option that is used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 的快取選項。

trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />，從指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> 建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />。

trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />，從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> 建立的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />。

trans-unit.target: 點陣圖的位置，其中會建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />。

trans-unit.target: 用來建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 的選項。

trans-unit.source: The cache option that is used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 的快取選項。

trans-unit.source: The caching requirements for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 的快取需求。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />, and <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />、<see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" />，從指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" /> 建立 <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />, and <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />、<see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" />，從指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" /> 建立的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption%2CSystem.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy%29> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption%2CSystem.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy%29> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> that is used to construct this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 用來建構這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />。

trans-unit.source: A thumbnail image of the resulting <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 產生之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 的縮圖影像。

trans-unit.source: The metadata to associate with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 相關聯的中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> objects that are associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> with the specified thumbnail, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" />, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的縮圖、<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />，從指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> 建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> with the specified thumbnail, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" />, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的縮圖、<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />，從指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> 建立的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter" />, which can be used to associate metadata with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter" /> 的執行個體，這個執行個體可用來建立中繼資料與 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 的關聯。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Metadata can only be added or edited using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> if the image file contains enough room for the new metadata; otherwise, metadata can be added using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料只能加入或編輯使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A>如果映像檔包含足夠空間供新的中繼資料; 否則中繼資料可以新增使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> object to open a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] graphic and write metadata by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>物件開啟[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)]圖形和寫入的中繼資料，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the decoder associated with this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中進行覆寫時，會取得與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 執行個體相關聯的解碼器。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the thumbnail image associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 相關聯的縮圖影像。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> that represents a thumbnail of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />，表示目前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 的縮圖。
